title: Forestry/timber trailers â€“ large
summary: Extract felled timber causing minimal disturbance to soil, flora and fauna.

description.descriptionText01: Forestry/timber trailers specifically designed for use in forests and woodland to extract felled timber causing minimal disturbance to soil, flora and fauna

eligibility.eligibiltyBullet01: Trailer must have a timber-carrying capacity of at least 9,000kg.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet02: Trailer must have no floor or sides and be fitted with permanent headboard and permanent bolsters.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet03: The vehicle must be fitted with low ground pressure tyres or automatic tyre inflation and deflation system.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet04: Must be fitted with lights to be legal to use on public roads.
